ModMetaData.name: CORE - a Rimworld of Magic Factions Expansion
ModMetaData.author: QraTz
ModMetaData.description: This tiny mod will implement many different kind of stuff that I'm going to use in all the Factions Expansion mods such as custom traits, different pawnkinds or vanilla code patches. If you have not this mod installed, the rest of the Factions Expansion addons will most likely to be full of bugs or they won't work at all.
